title: ArtyTorrent Pack 38-Slow Acoustic Drum loops 64-79bpm-WAV sample
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 38-Slow Acoustic Drum loops 64-79bpm-WAV samples
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Something for the headz. Downtempo drum loops recorded by live session drummers. Useful for producers of Rock, Trip Hip, Hip Hop and R&#039;n&#039;B.
Tempo is way down in the 64-79 bpm bracket, but you can always timestretch these loops to provide some crunchy funk to faster tracks.

Torrent contains 10 RAR files with 123 loops.
---------------------------------------------
Acoustic Style Loops 75 (9 loops)
Ambient Studio Drums 76 (15 loops)
Brian Daly Rock Beats 65-75 (16 loops)
Hip Hop Philosophy 75 (6 loops)
Slick Drum 75 (16 loops)
Slow Ludwig Kit 79 (6 loops)
Street Beats Loops 65-79 (11 loops)
Twisted Trip Hop 64-78 (10 loops)
Westside Underground 64-79 (4 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 65-75 (30 loops)

All samples are normalized 16-bit Acidized WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames, ready to be dropped into your own productions, or chopped up and effected as you wish.

The samples are from a variety of sources including CDs produced by E-lab, Sony/Acid and Zero-G.

More packs to follow, with the tempo on the increase...

--
Arty - "Nice and slow".
7th February 2008.
